title: Zion National Park: Places
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     History & Culture     Places               Places        The Zion National Park Lodge    Â    People have called the canyons and plateaus of Zion National Park home for over 10,000 years. The remnants of their time here exist throughout the park and are protected by the National Park Service. These structures, from humble granaries to improbable highways, stand as testaments to the ingenuity of those that came before us.  Archeological Sites The Zion Lodge The Zion-Mt. Carmel Highway and Tunnel
